description.rawText: We are seeking a Big Data Solution Enablement Manager who will report directly to the Managing Director,  World Wide Intel Search Engine Optimisation (SEO).  The Big Data Director of Hadoop deployments is a critical "buck stops here" position - responsible for all technical aspects of making customers successful with Hadoop deployments.  In this role,  you will be focused on:Growing and positioning enablement consulting services to support the adoption of Big Data solutions with internal and external customers. Leading a team of experienced consultants,  program managers and third party subcontractors who will provide the support and project management on each project to Intel's top customers. Analyzing what is working and what is not,  as well as the day to day practice utilization,  customer satisfaction,  and overall delivery process around Intel's products. Responsible for hiring,  developing and mentoring all SEO enablement consulting related resources in a team of high performance consultantsProviding input and accountability to development and implementation of consulting methodologies,  practices and processed to be used on a worldwide basisDeveloping repeatable methodologies to farm existing customer for new business and prevent competitive displacementThis role is critical to Intel's product success and is positioned within the fast growing units within the company. Requirements Project Delivery Prior demonstrable success in delivering superior quality work on time and within budget.  Ability to provide Project Management / Client Communication support,  including requirements review,  pre-engagement planning,  project planning,  and risk assessment.  Understand client requirements and design and provide architectural review based on customers' business model.  Demonstrated ability to provide innovative state-of-the-art technical solutions.  Ability to recognize project changes,  identify risks and contingency plans,  and work with customer Project Manager through change control process. Train And Assist Project Managers So As To Ensure ProperDocumented technical status reports are prepared for customersProject tracking to ensure on time project deliveryManagement of the utilization,  revenue and margin for each project. Experience developing/leading pre-sales,  post-sales product support,  and education/training is a strong positive.  Expectation is that this role will handling parts/all of these functions at times and in all cases will help the organization develop/staff these capabilities.  Ability to analyze complex customer business and technical requirements and develop enterprise-scale solutions leveraging the software products.  Ability to analyze complex issues for impact and alternative solutions,  making logical decisions based on overall product objectives.  Ability to prioritize tasks and manage time efficiently.  High level of self-initiative and self-motivation.  Customer Service/Communication Responsible for overall customer satisfaction with regards to delivery.  Able to build strong client relationships and be able to interact effectively at all levels of client organization.  Strong technical and business executive presence with proven ability to present to Executive customer management.  Ability to work with Partners,  and 3rd party integrators.  Proven ability to grow PS business through subcontracting/co-operative relationships.  Continuous contribution of best practices documentation and technical notes for internal and external distribution.  Able to recognize and effectively communicate possibilities to sell additional consulting services as it relates to client's needs.  Work with Services Sales and Regional Directors to estimate work and architect solutions.  Contribute to engagement planning including pre-sales support for RFP's,  RFI's,  and client meetingsQualificationsBS/BA preferred: Computer Science,  Math,  or Electrical Engineering preferred,  will consider other disciplines with relevant work experience. 4 + years (or the equivalent) of demonstrated excellence in delivering enterprise Hadoop/Big Data solutions,  from design and planning to deployment. Experience working with Cloudera,  Hortonworks,  MapR,  or other leading Hadoop distribution(S)4 + years experience (or the equivalent) with complex distributed software application architectures,  data center architecture,  network and application protocols,  and database reporting tools. Excellent written and oral communication skills are required.  Writing samples will be reviewed. Able to work effectively independently as a team leader. Ability to travel - 25% to 50%Additional Preferred QualificationsBig 4 Security,  Technical Audit,  or Professional Consulting experienceMBA/Master's degreeCorporate experience preferred. CISSP,  CISM,  CISA

companyDescription.rawText: Creating and extending computing technology to connect and enrich the lives of every person on Earth--that's our vision,  is it yours? We are changing the world at Intel.  Through our technical innovation,  our endless efforts in education,  environmental sustainability,  healthcare,  and much,  much more.  The range of computing products based on Intel® architecture goes beyond PCs and servers and extends to phones,  tablets,  consumer electronics devices,  and more.  We are the world's largest semiconductor chip maker,  based on revenue.  Platforms are designed and configured to work together to provide an optimized user computing solution--one that is seamless,  connected and puts the user at the center.  Step inside our world and you’ll find one brilliant mind after another working together in a spirit of collaboration that is simply contagious.  And through this shared dedication—this culture of innovation and exploration—we do more than deliver the latest technologies.  We deliver the future.  See for yourself.  Look Inside.
